bill_title: to provide for the liability of certain prisoners confined to jail for the costs of certain services and confinement and to provide a lien therefor.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the liability of certain prisoners confined to jail for the costs of certain services and confinement and to provide a lien therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 24-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: In the calculation of any room and board charges for which a prisoner may be liable under the provisions of this chapter, an amount of fifty dollars per day shall be used. Section 2. That chapter 24-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Reimbursement for room and board charges, medical, dental, optometric, and psychiatric service charges, vocational training, and chemical dependency treatment charges may be required as a term or condition of probation or suspended sentence imposed pursuant to chapter 23A-27. Section 3. That chapter 24-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Whenever any county pays for the costs of confinement of a prisoner in a detention facility, the county shall have a lien pursuant to chapter 28-14, for the prisoner's room and board during confinement, unless all or part of such costs or charges are waived pursuant to § 24-11-45, and for all medical, dental, optometric, and psychiatric services charges, vocational education training and chemical dependency treatment charges regarding such prisoner. Such lien is effective as between the county and prisoner and other persons having actual knowledge of the prisoner's confinement, immediately upon the providing of such room and board, care and maintenance to or for the benefit of such prisoner.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the liability of certain prisoners confined to jail for the costs of certain services and confinement and to provide a lien therefor. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 24-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Reimbursement for room and board charges, medical, dental, optometric, and psychiatric service charges, vocational training charges, and chemical dependency treatment charges may be required as a term or condition of probation or suspended sentence imposed pursuant to chapter 23A-27. The court shall fix the amount of reimbursement at the time of sentencing. Section 2. That chapter 24-11 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Whenever any county pays for the costs of confinement of a prisoner in a detention facility, the county shall have a lien pursuant to chapter 28-14, for the prisoner's room and board during confinement, unless all or part of such costs or charges are waived pursuant to § 24-11-45, and for all medical, dental, optometric, and psychiatric services charges, vocational education training charges and chemical dependency treatment charges regarding such prisoner.
